item.title: GCP container registry and terraform provider docker
item.description: Here are some snippets you can use to get the terraform docker provider to work with the google container registry gcr.io: # Your config provider "google" {} data "google_client_config" "default" {} provider "docker" { registry_auth { address = "gcr.io" username = "oauth2accesstoken" password = "${data.google_client_config.default.access_token}" } } data "google_container_registry_image" "myapp_tagged" { name = "${var.docker_image_myapp}" tag = "${var.docker_image_tag_myapp}" } data "docker_registry_image" "myapp" { name = "${data.google_container_registry_image.myapp_tagged.image_url}" } data "google_container_registry_image" "myapp" { name = "${var.
